mapper.select: select cn_notebook_id as notebookId, cn_user_id as userId , cn_notebook_type_id as notebookTypeId, cn_notebook_name as notebookName, cn_notebook_desc as notebookDesc, cn_notebook_createtime as notebookCreateTime from cn_notebook where cn_user_id=#{userId} order by cn_notebook_createtime desc
mapper.insert: insert into cn_notebook( cn_notebook_id, cn_user_id, cn_notebook_type_id, cn_notebook_name, cn_notebook_desc, cn_notebook_createtime) values( #{notebookId}, #{userId}, #{notebookTypeId}, #{notebookName}, #{notebookDesc}, #{notebookCreateTime} )
